#Text= Amon says : " Hey , guys , I 'm totally in for taking out Bolin .

column1: #Text=But can we please not include — " Unalaq says : " Not include who , Amon ?
#Text=The diabolical but incredibly boring and unpopular sorcerer from the north , who 's listening in on the other line !
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I 've spent my life trying to defeat Nuktuk , I mean , Bolin , and I know just where to find him : With all the beautiful ladies !
